name: sporty-urban-ecommerce
description: e-commerce app that has the basics to launch a store

scripts.start: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:prod: npm i && npm run install:all && npm run start:all
scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run start" "cd backend && npm run start"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix ./frontend && npm run build --prefix ./frontend && npm install
scripts.update:all: npm run update:backend && npm run update:frontend
